alert.note: Alert for Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Pecos; Reeves County Plains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 2:51PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Pecos, northwestern Brewster, south central Reeves and southeastern Jeff Davis Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 251 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Alpine, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alpine, Alpine-Casparis Municipal Airport and Camp Mitre Peak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Pecos; Reeves County Plains
